Package com.conmuti.conmuti.mutator.coreclasses

Class MutationWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conmuti.conmuti.mutator.coreclasses.MutationWorker
  • public abstract class MutationWorker
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class with static methods which work through mutations

      A method to move compiled class files from the java directory to the class directory

      A method which moves the mutant source code, stored as "Mutant.java" in the ConMuti filepath, to replace the original source code file at the user source code root

      A method which applies, tests, and logs mutations
      static void saveCU​(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu)
      A method which saves a CompilationUnit - the object representing the Abstract Syntax Tree of the source code, and stores it in String form as "Mutant.java" in the local ConMuti folder

      • compileMutant

        public static int compileMutant​(UserData userData)
        A method which compiles the java source code files located within the user's java file directory
        Parameters:
        userData - - An object representing the user's file system
        Returns:
        - 0 if compilation successful, non-zero otherwise

      • getNoOfMutationOpportunities

        public static int getNoOfMutationOpportunities​(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu,
                                               MutationCounter type)
        A method to obtain the number of mutation opportunities of a given mutation type within a compilation unit
        Parameters:
        cu - - the compilation unit
        type - - the type of mutation (an object extending the MutationCounter class)
        Returns:
        - the number of mutation opportunities

      • getUnmodifiedCU

        public static com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit getUnmodifiedCU()
        A method which gets the CompilationUnit of the source code stored in the local "SavedCode.java" file
        Returns:
        - the CompilationUnit Abstract Syntax Tree of the unmodified "SavedCode.java" file

        A method to return a file name filter which filters out java files
        Returns:
        - a java file name filter

      • logResult

        public static void logResult​(DataLog log)
        Calls the DataLog.logResult method on a DataLog object (this removes the requirement for the "run" method to handle an exception)
        Parameters:
        log - - the DataLog object to be logged in the data log

      • moveClassFiles

        public static void moveClassFiles​(UserData userData)
        A method to move compiled class files from the java directory to the class directory
        Parameters:
        userData - - a representation of the user's file system

      • moveMutantToSourceDirectory

        public static void moveMutantToSourceDirectory​(UserData userData)
        A method which moves the mutant source code, stored as "Mutant.java" in the ConMuti filepath, to replace the original source code file at the user source code root
        Parameters:
        userData - - An object representing the user's file system

      • run

        public static void run​(UserData userData,
                       DirectoryTestRunner directoryTestRunner,
                       MutationCounter counter,
                       MutationModifier modifier,
                       java.lang.String type)
        A method which applies, tests, and logs mutations
        Parameters:
        userData - - an object representing the user's file system
        directoryTestRunner - - an object providing unit test capability
        counter - - any MutationCounter object
        modifier - - any MutationModifier object
        type - - a string representing the mutation type

      • saveCU

        public static void saveCU​(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu)
        A method which saves a CompilationUnit - the object representing the Abstract Syntax Tree of the source code, and stores it in String form as "Mutant.java" in the local ConMuti folder
        Parameters:
        cu - - A CompilationUnit: the Abstract Syntax Tree of a computer program.
